Description: Textile (cushion cover?) made of two different cloths sewn together with blue and undyed silk sewing threads; cloth (a) woven in undyed and blue silk; cloth (b) woven in undyed linen and decorated with bands and friezes of goemetric and stylised vegetal motifs in brown silk brocade (now almost completely gone) and geometric motifs in red and blue silk brocade. (a) Warp: silk, undyed, S2i, 11/cm Weft: silk, undyed and blue, S2i, 22/cm (b) Warp: linen, undyed, Z, 22/cm Weft: linen, undyed, Z, 22/cm
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
